response.summary: Agricultural engineer from the National University, master's student at the Federal University of Viçosa. Undergraduate thesis project in bioclimatology applied to cane production. Experience in research projects in the ICIS investigation group in coffee and soil drying. Experience in design projects in hydraulics and solar dryers for agribusiness. I made an exchange program in agriculture in the United States in greenhouse management in flower's production and vegetable farm, i'm currently developing postgraduate thesis in simulation of facilities for suinoculture in Colombia.
response.skills: Project Management, Coffee, Image Processing, Agriculture, Data Analysis, Engineering, AutoCAD, Microsoft Office, Hydraulic Calculations, Cycling

profile_positions.description:
Schroeder's Flowers: Design, management and decision support in activities in Green houses: irrigation systems, control and monitoring systems for temperature and relative humidity, design of greenhouses, ventilation systems, brightness control. Floriculture and horticulture production: annuals, bulbs, perennials, rose bushes and potted plants like mums, poinsettias and Easter lilies for wholesale sales as well as retail.

Spears Farm: Vegetable farm, management in open field production, supporting crops as: tomatoes, peppers, summer squash, cucumbers, winter squash. Use of tractor implements for harvesting.
profile_positions.title: Internship Trainee

profile_positions.description: Designed, planned and executed post-harvest projects, technical assistance, technology transfer, work supervision, wastewater treatment, implementation of photovoltaic systems, drying temperature and humidity control systems, training for coffee and cocoa producers. Supported the creation of the commercial area of the company, improve and control the process of sale of products.
profile_positions.title: Agricultural Engineer

profile_positions.description: Participated in research projects: dehydration drying for specialty coffees, construction of a drying tower for agricultural products, evaluation of uni-axial compression tests of soil samples from the Bogotá savanna. Presented a project for the improvement of the internal production environment for panela.
profile_positions.title: research group member

profile_positions.description: Designed, planned and executed free flow and pressure hydraulic projects for industry and construction for large companies in Bogotá, work supervision and staff management. Supported the administrative process and commercial area of the company. Get promoted in the company to project manager.
profile_positions.title: Project Director

profile_positions.description: Supported the hydraulic and hydrological design for AutoCAD modeling of intakes and grit traps for more than 10 projects in different places in Colombia. Made 2D plans in AutoCAD, reviewed geographic and hydrological information of the project areas.
profile_positions.title: Hydraulic design assistant

education.field_of_study: Rural constructions, postharvest, irrigation and drainage
